attributes.action: ensure that former Prime Minister Tony Blair is never given any title that could ever possibly be bestowed on the former Prime Minister Tony Blair by the Prime Minister or the Crown or any part of the executive she governs, nor any private enterprise that acts in the Crown's name in perpetuity for all time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am asking that the Prime Minister and the Crown never give the former Prime Minister Tony Blair any title that could ever be bestowed by the Prime Minister or the Crown or the executive or any private firm established by the executive or the Crown to give out titles.

rejection.details: This government can not commit to such a promise on behalf of the Crown or any future government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
